data.title: 2/2 Howard Avenue, Ringwood East VIC 3135
data.meta_description: Single-level ease and convenience: Unit in Ringwood East with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and parking for 1 car - Sold by Luke Simms
data.text:
Appreciate the wonderful seclusion within this single-level residence, ideal for downsizers, first home buyers or savvy investors looking to secure a great future in a sought-after area.

Quite a rare find, take a leisurely stroll to Heathmont shops and train station, Eastwood Primary School and Tintern Boys', Girls' Grammar; also in the Ringwood Secondary College Zone

Set in the middle of only 3, sunshine streams through the large windows of the spacious open-plan living, meals and separate lounge room with split system air-conditioner. A fabulous size for those who love to cook, the kitchen is also a great place to entertain as your guests step outside to the private courtyard or the lush and very private back garden.

Entirely comfortable throughout with 2 double bedrooms (built-in robes), an immaculate bathroom, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a wide single auto garage.

A 2 bedroom, single level home on a very quiet street Stroll to shops, train and many excellent schools Sun-lit living, meals and separate lounge room Well-proportioned and pristine kitchen Private courtyard and lush back garden Wide single auto garage

Terms: 10% deposit, balance 30/60/90 days
